attributes.action: Keep Britannia and the other traditional heraldic designs on the 'tail' side of our coins.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britannia has been a symbol of our nation for two thousand years and she has been a traditional emblem on coins for over three hundred years; and this is yet another horrific attempt to scrap all symbols of this nation to appease those who the government think might be offended, which is very hypocritical since at the time when this was agreed to Gordon Brown was emphasising that he would work to promote 'Britishness'. Most Britons celebrate these symbols and do not want them erased from history.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
